name: horizontal_carousel
description: Horizontal carousel for images, videos, divs. Supports variable width content! Easily style and customize.

scripts.dist: rollup src/*.js --format esm --dir dist --exports auto --name horizontal_carousel --config

scriptsNotes.npm run dist: --format must be 'esm'! During build, rollup will transform to 'umd' hybrid. See rollup.config.js
